content: Is there a reason why Std is still on v4.7.0-rc1? I thought it would be on v4.7.0-rc2 now.
i assume it builds fine on both, since mathlib is rc2
I think it's an omission. @Scott Morrison? I'm asking because I have workflows that trigger when Std updates its toolchain but I just noticed they hadn't triggered for v4.7.0-rc2 yet.
An omission. Please feel free to PR the bump.
